About_1: Blog header maker is a simple online tool for building header images for my personal blog.
About_2: It is built with Vue 3 and Vuetify, and supports multiple languages, including Chinese and English.
About_3: This is my first Vue practice project. I hope to learn Vue basic syntax and design ideas through this project.
About_4: If you have any questions or suggestions, please raise them on GitHub.
